attributes.additional_details:
LEGISLATION SHOULD BE PASSED THAT REQUIRES ALL SPENDING OF ANY AMOUNT OF OVERSEAS AID TO HAVE TO BE DEBATED AND VOTED ON BY MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT PRIOR   TO AID BEING DISTRIB....................WITH NO EXCEPTIONS  IN ANY WAY WHAT SO EVER .......

WITH SUCH LEGISLATION IN PLACE THE PUBLIC / VOTERS / ELECTORATE CAN THEN LOBBY THEIR OWN ELECTED MEMBERS TO TAKE CONTROL  AND CURTAIL THE THROW AWAY ATTITUDE  OF DAVID " SCATTER CASH "  CAMERON
